text: wlqd atayna musaa altawrat min baed ma 'ahlakna al'umam alty kanat min qablih -kqwm nuh waead wathamud waqawm lut wa'ashab "mdyn"- fiha basayir libani 'israyyl, yubsirun biha ma yanfaeuhum wama ydrhm, wafiha rahmatan liman eamal biha mnhm; laealahum yatadhakarun nieam allah elyhm, fyshkrwh elyha, wala ykfrwh
